fields.name: backgroundColor
fields.desc: The background color of the destination.

fields.name: icon
fields.desc: The [Widget] (usually an [Icon]) that's displayed for this [NavigationDestination].

fields.name: selectedIcon
fields.desc: The optional [Widget] (usually an [Icon]) that's displayed when this [NavigationDestination] is selected.

fields.name: label
fields.desc: The text label that appears on the right of the icon

fields.name: enabled
fields.desc: Indicates that this destination is selectable.
